verses.verse: Then <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%> <S%H6030>answering<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

But the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H453>Elihu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1292>Barachel<s%> the <S%H940>Buzite,<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H7410>Ram<s%> <S%H2734>burned;<s%> against <S%H347>Job<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> he <S%H6663>justified<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they had <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4617>answer,<s%> and yet had <S%H7561>condemned<s%> <S%H347>Job.<s%>
Now <S%H453>Elihu<s%> had <S%H2442>waited<s%> to <S%H1697>speak<s%> to <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they were <S%H3117>years<s%> <S%H2205>older<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he.

And when <S%H453>Elihu<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4617>answer<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned.<s%>

So <S%H453>Elihu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1292>Barachel<s%> the <S%H940>Buzite<s%> <S%H6030>spoke<s%> out and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H6810>young<s%> in <S%H3117>years<s%> and you are <S%H3453>old;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I was <S%H2119>shy<s%> and <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H2331>tell<s%> you <S%H1843>what<s%> I <S%H1843>think.<s%>
"I <S%H559>thought<s%> <S%H3117>age<s%> should <S%H1696>speak,<s%> And <S%H7230>increased<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> should <S%H3045>teach<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
"But it is a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in <S%H582>man,<s%> And the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H995>gives<s%> them <S%H995>understanding.<s%>
"The <S%H7227>abundant<s%> [in years] may not be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> may <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
<S%H3651>"So<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8085>'Listen<s%> to me, I <S%H637>too<s%> will <S%H2331>tell<s%> <S%H1843>what<s%> I <S%H1843>think.<s%>'

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H3176>waited<s%> for your <S%H1697>words,<s%> I <S%H238>listened<s%> to your <S%H8394>reasonings,<s%> <S%H5704>While<s%> you <S%H2713>pondered<s%> <S%H4405>what<s%> to <S%H4405>say.<s%>

"I even <S%H995>paid<s%> <S%H995>close<s%> <S%H995>attention<s%> to you, <S%H2009>Indeed,<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who <S%H3198>refuted<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> Not one of you who <S%H6030>answered<s%> his <S%H561>words.<s%>
"Do not <S%H559>say,<s%> 'We have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> will <S%H5086>rout<s%> him, not <S%H376>man.<s%>'
"For he has not <S%H6186>arranged<s%> [his] <S%H4405>words<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> me; <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will I <S%H7725>reply<s%> to him with your <S%H561>arguments.<s%>
"They are <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> they <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more;<s%> <S%H4405>Words<s%> have <S%H6275>failed<s%> them.
"And shall I <S%H3176>wait,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they do not <S%H1696>speak,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> they <S%H5975>stop<s%> [and] <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%>?
"I <S%H637>too<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> my <S%H2506>share,<s%> I <S%H637>also<s%> will <S%H2331>tell<s%> my <S%H1843>opinion.<s%>
"For I am <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4405>words;<s%> The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H990>within<s%> me <S%H6693>constrains<s%> me.
<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> my <S%H990>belly<s%> is like <S%H3808>unvented<s%> <S%H6605><s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> Like <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H178>wineskins<s%> it is about to <S%H1234>burst.<s%>
"Let me <S%H1696>speak<s%> that I may <S%H7304>get<s%> <S%H7304>relief;<s%> Let me <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> and <S%H6030>answer.<s%>
"Let me <S%H4994>now<s%> be <S%H5375>partial<s%> <S%H6440><s%> to <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>one;<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H3655>flatter<s%> [any] <S%H120>man.<s%>
"For I do not <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H3655>flatter,<s%> [Else] my <S%H6213>Maker<s%> would <S%H4592>soon<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> me away.
